text.name: EV_KS_warning2
text.text: ShuttleShift/Control can't be used from EnhancedVehicle and KeyboardSteer the same time.

text.name: EV_KS_warning3
text.text: If you like to use shuttle control from KeyboardSteer (recommended):

text.name: EV_KS_warning4
text.text: * open the KeyboardSteer configuration (default: CTRL+C) and set 'Shuttle' to 'On'

text.name: EV_KS_warning5
text.text: * open the XML config(*) from EnhancedVehicle, set the variable 'ShuttleIsEnabled' to 'false' and reload config (default: KeyPad *)

text.name: EV_KS_warning6
text.text: If you like to use shuttle shift from EnhancedVehicle:

text.name: EV_KS_warning7
text.text: * open the KeyboardSteer configuration (default: CTRL+C) and set 'Shuttle' to 'Off'

text.name: EV_KS_warning5
text.text: * open the XML config(*) from EnhancedVehicle, set the variable 'ShuttleIsEnabled' to 'true' and reload config (default: KeyPad *)
